dct_title_s: A topographical & complete map of San Francisco
dct_alternative_sm: Containing all the latest extensions and improvements, new street, alleys, places, wharfs &c. &c. containing all the latest extensions and improvements
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "Varas".
Shows drainage, vegetation block and lot numbers, partial land ownership, wards, places of worship, theatres, wharves, Yerba Buena Cemetery, etc.
"Respectfully dedicated to the citizens of San Francisco."
"For sale by Cooke & Le Count, Stationer's. Montgomery Street."
2 pictorial vignettes: The new City Hall -- B. Davidson's Banking House.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Warren Heckrotte Map Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain.  There are no restrictions on use.  If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
